This is a testharness.js-based test.
[FAIL] Permissions policy "geolocation" can be enabled in same-origin iframe using allow="geolocation" attribute
  assert_true: geolocation expected true got false
[FAIL] Permissions policy "geolocation" can be enabled in cross-origin iframe using allow="geolocation" attribute
  assert_true: geolocation expected true got false
Harness: the test ran to completion.
